amendment.description: To provide an equitable offset for any fee charged the Department of Defense by the Department of State for maintenance, upgrade, or construction of United States diplomatic facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 822 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 822 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6901; text: CR S6901) To provide an equitable offset for any fee charged the Department of Defense by the Department of State for maintenance, upgrade, or construction of United States diplomatic facilities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 822 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 822 proposed by Senator Warner.
